title: FrankDevBakedWeed
author: FrankDevBakedWeed
content: Getting Started with BakedWEED MinerStep 1‚Ää-‚ÄäMake sure you have some BNB in your wallet and then visit the BakedWEED.CLUB website. I would be very grateful if you would use link when signing up. It costs you nothing but I would get some additional 'WEED' when you deposit:-https://app.bakedweed.club/Step 2‚Ää-‚ÄäClick the "Connect" button on the top right. This will allow you to make your BNB deposit.Step 3‚Ää-‚ÄäDecide how much BNB you wish to invest and then select the 'BakedWEED' button. In the below example I have selected a small example quantity of BNB to invest and the 'Bake WEED' button is now highlighted.Step 4‚Ää-‚ÄäRe-bake your WEED or Eat your WEED?This is entirely up to you. My strategy is just to re-bake my WEED for a number of weeks and then I will switch to the recommended strategy by many which is to then 'eat weed' once per week! The smart contract has sustainability tokenomics built into it so the more frequently you eat your WEED your reward percentage will drop. This is why it is recommended to only eat your beans once per week so you do not damage your earning potential.ConclusionHonestly, I am quite excited about this one. At 10% per day the earning potential from this miner is phenomenal. The bakedweed community is very welcoming and everyone seems to be on the same page about ensuring this stays sustainable, but of course only time will tell. From what I am seeing right now I am very confident in the project.I hope you found this guide useful and if you have questions you can message me on telegram using @https://t.me/FrankDev1Happy WEED eating!https://t.me/BakedWeedGrouphttps://twitter.com/weed_baked
